welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Winkfield, the charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We are delighted to have you here and invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Winkfield has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Blackbushe Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial flights and private charters.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Farnborough Airport offers exclusive services for private jet passengers, including VIP lounges and concierge services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for domestic flights and some European destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used for international flights and serving as the main hub for Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A medium-sized terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for long-haul flights and serving as the main hub for Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A medium-sized terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for long-haul flights and serving as the main hub for SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The second newest and second largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used for international flights and serving as the main hub for British Airways.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 45-minute time limit for basic access. Premium options are available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WIFI is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busier of the two terminals, serving mainly European and domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the newer of the two terminals, serving a mix of short and long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration after a certain amount of time.
